title: Pattern Matcher
code:
§begin match_pattern
  sequence ← [1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13]
  pattern ← [1, 1, 2]
  matches ← 0
  §iterate val §in sequence
    §if val ≈ 1
      matches ← matches ⊕ 1
    §end_if
  §end_iterate
  §transmit matches
§end
solution_description: counts how many times the value 1 appears in a sequence
hints: Counts occurrences of a specific value
The value 1 appears twice in the sequence
This is a basic pattern matching algorithm
